section.p: The StartApplication task is used to start the WebSphere server.
section.h2: Running StartApplication with definition in pom
section.p:
Running the StartApplication task with the definition defined in the build section of the pom (start the server first, optional parameters omitted):
<dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId> <artifactId>was5-plugin</artifactId> <version>1.0</version> <scope>runtime</scope> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId> <artifactId>was5-plugin</artifactId> <version>1.0</version> <executions> <execution> <id>start server</id> <phase>validate</phase> <goals> <goal>StartServer</goal> </goals> </execution> <execution> <id>start application</id> <phase>pre-integration-test</phase> <goals> <goal>StartApplication</goal> </goals> </execution> </executions> <configuration> <ear> ${artifactId}-${project.version}.ear </ear> <wasHome> C:/Programfiles/WebSphere/AppServer </wasHome> </configuration> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
